CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( Collection_Date__c ) ) , Lab__r.Is_Voided_LU__c = false), If ( Collection_Date__c + 365 > Today(), 0, IF( DATE( YEAR (TODAY()) , MONTH( Collection_Date__c ) , DAY( Collection_Date__c ) ) <= Today(), YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( Collection_Date__c ), YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( Collection_Date__c ) -1 )), null)
CustomField.label: Age
